attributes.action: Performance related pay for the Police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Link Police pay to directly to their performance, If the police kill a single innocent person in year (83 last year), then the police will recieve no pay increase at all. Similiarly if poor quality of investigation or other incompetence leads to a single innocent person being convicted then they should recieve no pay increase.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
